sentences.pinyin: wǒ yāoqǐng nǐ lái wǒ de pàiduì.
sentences.translation: I invite you to my party.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于他的表现非常出色，公司决定邀请他在年会上发表讲话。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於他的表現非常出色，公司決定邀請他在年會上發表講話。
sentences.pinyin: yóu yú tā de biǎoxiàn fēicháng chūsè, gōngsī juédìng yāoqǐng tā zài niánhuì shàng fābiǎo jiǎnghuà.
sentences.translation: Due to his excellent performance, the company decided to invite him to give a speech at the annual meeting.
